channel.title: reverse-engineering on Ministry Of Pwning
channel.description: Recent content in reverse-engineering on Ministry Of Pwning

item.title: Mobile One Solution
item.description: The Problem: Mobile One The Clue: The one true mobile app. Summary Very common intro mobile crack-me. Decompile apk using method of choice. Search strings for flag. Get flag. Nothing to it. This challenge could have been completed using the strings tool, but I have become used to just opening .apk’s in jadx-gui right away. Usually what I am looking for isn’t simply grep-able, so it isn’t second nature for me to grep the strings.

item.title: Pretty Happy Web Processor Solution
item.description: The Problem: firmware.ins (See README for instructions on extracting the image.) The Clue: Who knew embedded web servers ran PHP natively? And it's easy to read! Or is it?! Warning: This challenge’s flag reqiures the player to generate the flag by taking an MD5 hash of a defined PHP function named mb_version. Summary When I submitted the correct flag, I became the 9th person to solve this challenge (with a total of 12 solves at the end of the event).
